name: Escape From Flea Market Montgomery (2017)
description:
(Adapted from "SCP-087-B" by Undertow Games in accordance with their Creative Commons licensing.)

Escape from Sammy Stephens before he catches you and takes you to Flea Market Montgomery which, allegedly, is "just like a mini mall".

Created as part of "GAME HELL" for the Twitch channel Gatorbox: http://www.twitch.tv/gatorbox WSAD to move, Escape to quit.
